WRITING.TEXT: Thanks, friends!

Confirming the first answer! Our camping isn't priced like a hotel per night; it's for the entirety of your stay, and you're welcome to stay from Wednesday through Monday morning following the race on Sunday. As long as you're within your spot, multiple tents with your vehicle are A-OK! GEICO Grounds Blue doesn't have a quiet time, so other campers aren't obligated to turn off music or their generators. It can get a little rowdy at night there as well. Blue is a great spot to camp because you're also close to Talladega and Eastaboga Blvd, which both get pretty fun, especially on Friday and Saturday nights - both with scheduled activities from us and then the parties our campers throw. For entry into the infield - our crossover Gate V9 near Turn 3 is open 24 hours starting on Wednesday morning, with the exception of when there's on-track activity. You'll also be able to enter through the North Tunnel near Turn 4 since you won't be in an RV. So even if you get here a little later at night, you'll have no problem with entry. Shoot us a message if you have more questions!
Good deal! Excited you'll be here!

Happy birthday, Wendell! A few pics of him at 'Dega: [Part of the 1969 PDA Meeting](https://i.imgur.com/SFiOJie.jpg) [Working in the garage area](https://i.imgur.com/c9YTCT9.jpg) [Practice for the 1972 Winston 500](https://i.imgur.com/MDjueOs.jpg)
That's Johnny Ray! You see his truck before every race here at 'Dega hauling the American Flag during the National Anthem! Legend.
Hell of a run! Have a great rest of the season!
Never too early to start the party!
THIRD?!?! Just kidding. Glad we're up there and happy to be here!

Hey! No full autograph sessions that we know of, but there will definitely be driver appearances in the Fan Zone at various displays. We're hoping to get a full list of finalized appearances with times and locations by today and tomorrow! As soon as we get them, we add them to our [weekend schedule](http://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/Plan-Your-Visit/Weekend-Schedule.aspx). Hope that helps! Excited y'all will be here!
Pumped to have them in the family!
Yep! Crews have been doing an amazing job!
Let's shoot for zero.
The DAYTONA 500 can't get here fast enough.
Come on down!
Lol this whole post was amazing. Yes! Come visit us soon!
The whole show was awesome. But man... this ending... ALL the feels.
Much love!
This is awesome! See y'all soon!
Well good morning! Yep, this is one of our promo pace cars. #128077;

WRITING.TITLE: Fly-through preview of Talladega Garage Experience opening October 2019
WRITING.TEXT: Excited to share with y'all! [Talladega Garage Experience | Transformation Infield Project](http://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/Buy-Tickets/Fan-Hospitality-and-Upgrades/Talladega-Garage-Experience.aspx) https://reddit.com/link/azun15/video/7tf23uzz9il21/player
Designers had a little fun with that one.
That North campground is something special indeed. Thank you!
We're still going to keep that Gate 9 crossover functional for use as needed, like with pedestrian traffic for the concert and other things!

It was **AWESOME**. Check out more photos [here](https://www.facebook.com/pg/TalladegaSuperspeedway/photos/?tab=album amp;album_id=10157151564034594). First class organization. We'll be adding more to that album later too. Hoping to have some of those guys here April 28 for the GEICO 500! #8203; [And this pic is just straight fire.](https://imgur.com/LgpMD8B)
See y'all soon!!!
Infield Overflow Parking! [Here's a map for you.](https://imgur.com/J7inwev)
Happy race week, y'all!
[Infield Overflow Lot](https://imgur.com/J7inwev)

WRITING.TITLE: Hot Laps with Chase Briscoe at 'Dega!
WRITING.TEXT: u/C_Briscoe was our 1st driver of the weekend to hit the track since the addition of the new tunnel. Check it out! (Forgive the shaky camera work). https://reddit.com/link/bgx708/video/irr95q7os8u21/player

He was just an incredible man and friend. We #8217;re blessed to have been able to know him for so long. He absolutely loved #8216;Dega and would do anything to help anyone. The tradition will continue; John Ray and his wonderful family own the truck, and his son Johnny is the one who drove it this April. We #8217;re so thankful Roger was able to be with us for so many special moments. His spirit will always be part of us. Addition - if you're interested in learning about the origin of this tradition with John Ray, [read more here.](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/Articles/2016/Patriotic-Pre-Race-Lap-Johnny-Ray.aspx)

We're so excited! [Riley](https://www.rileygreenmusic.com/) is from right down the road in Jacksonville, AL and grew up coming here. It's a special place for him and his family and friends. So awesome to bring it all back together full circle this October!

Just a note on garage admissions! Our [Talladega Garage Experience](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/tge) is brand new - the grand opening is this October. It's part of our huge Transformation infield project. Fans can stay in that area or move up to the grandstands for the race. We always recommend sitting up high in the towers!

We're still finalizing schedules, but it will most likely open at 8 AM on Sunday! Still TBD on the exact closing time (typically one hour post-race). There will be a couple of ways to access this area: 1. Take the tram from the North Tunnel by Turn 4 into the infield to the Main Entry of the Talladega Garage Experience. This is also another way to exit after pre-race activities end and the grandstand crossover gates close. 2. Enter through the grandstands (Gate EP4 will be open the earliest) and head toward the track to the crossover gates, and walk across the track! There will be a chute that gets you from the track to the Main Entry of the Talladega Garage Experience. These admissions will allow you walk up and down pit road and also be at the start-finish line for Driver Introductions - just like our old pit passes! After Driver Introductions are complete, security will sweep that area, and you can either immediately head up into the grandstands to your seats via the crossover gates, or head back into the Talladega Garage Experience. To get back to the grandstands from there, you would take the tram back through the North Tunnel, or you could also utilize the Joyride golf cart service. With this new experience, fans are also welcome to be in Celebration Plaza within the TGE for Victory Lane. We're recommending leaving plenty of time (i.e. 50-60 laps to go) to get to the tram or a Joyride cart from your grandstand seats for that.

We are VERY VERY VERY excited. This is to celebrate both our and RCR #8217;s 50th anniversaries. The plan is to also have the car on display during pre-race on Sunday for photos. It #8217;s even more special since we #8217;re so tied to RCR #8217;s beginning. RC used the money he got from running in our first Cup race (lots of great stories with him getting that opportunity / the PDA boycott) to start his team. Also pretty sweet is that RC and our Chairman Grant Lynch have been great friends for more than 30 years. Can #8217;t wait to see that beauty back on track!
For the beginning #128077;
Definitely have gotten a surge today in questions about tickets. Can't wait!
Yesss! We love our Canadian friends!
It #8217;s a really interesting moment in history. There are a lot of great stories from all different sides from that weekend, especially Richard #8217;s.

Hey there! Our Spring 2020 renewal deadline is December 6, and the final day of upgrades/relocations for those guests will be December 20! Give our Ticket Office a call after that time at 855.518.RACE (7223) or shoot us an e-mail as a heads up at [tss-ticketoffice@talladegasuperspeedway.com](mailto:tss-ticketoffice@talladegasuperspeedway.com). Our official on-sale date for the spring is January 6. Be on the lookout for more renewal info here: [www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/renewals](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/renewals)

Hey! Some resources for you: [www.degarooms.com](https://www.degarooms.com) \- Has hotel and shuttle info to cross reference with other sites We have military pricing options for tickets as well as for our new Talladega Garage Experience that's opening next weekend: [www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/military](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/military) / [www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/tge](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/tge) If your boys happen to be 12 or younger, we have a great Sunday Kids VIP program that lets you sign up for cool behind-the-scenes pre-race opportunities with a Talladega Garage Experience admission. Some of these things include hot laps, pit box or hauler tours with teams, a spot on the red carpet to the drivers meeting for autographs, and more: [www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/kids](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/kids) We have a ton of free day parking and free tram services: [http://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/Plan-Your-Visit/Parking-Traffic-Hub.aspx](http://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/Plan-Your-Visit/Parking-Traffic-Hub.aspx) The best views are definitely from tower seats. You'll get the best pricing by calling our Ticket Office directly. Our Account Executive who's in charge of our military initiative is great! He can help build the best experience for your family based on budget and more. His name is Dean May. Phone number is 256.761.4766, and you can e-mail him at [dmay@talladegasuperspeedway.com](mailto:dmay@talladegasuperspeedway.com)!
We can #8217;t wait to have y #8217;all here! It #8217;s going to be an awesome weekend!
They're legit! It's our partnership with Vroomz!
[https://vroomz.com/](https://vroomz.com/)

WRITING.TITLE: Happy race week from #8217;Dega! Here #8217;s this morning #8217;s sunrise from the spotters #8217; stand atop the new Race Ops!

WRITING.TEXT: THANK YOU for sharing this! It's always so awesome to hear how special this place is in different ways to so many people. Hope you have an amazing weekend!
Great weekend, guys! And congrats on your 50th too!!
Yes, it's a throwback to the 70s and early 80s! That main center backdrop slides, so the race winner will pull in vertically, then we'll slide it closed behind.

We expect the peak time for autographs in the new Talladega Garage Experience to be around the Cup practices on Friday. Admissions for that new area replaced all pit passes. We're also finalizing the weekend Q amp;A schedule for the stage in Fr8Auctions Celebration Plaza behind Gatorade Victory Lane. There will also be appearances in the Midway throughout the weekend, and as soon as we have all those finalized times, we'll throw them on our schedule page - [www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/schedule](https://www.talladegasuperspeedway.com/schedule) As far as diecasts, we're not 100% sure what will be available this weekend. But there should be some drivers venture out there at some points Saturday or Sunday!
Safe travels! We love when our Canadian friends visit!
